name: Forest Grind
description:
A club participant student falls asleep and wakes up without anybody in his club to accompany him home! 

He then encounters a creature of certain death:

A black dragon with red eyes! What could happen?

An unending VNRPG adventure begins at the most basic of places:

Your favorite Magical forest!

Submission for NaNo RenO Visual Novel Game Jam!

Also, for a school project, making SQL Database connections to python programs

Database functions are removed for now, but soon, it'll be online, if we find a server for it. So yeah, this was also kinda just programming practice lol

It's a VN, fyt me.

Made in Ren'py

Credits:

Ren'py Visual Novel Engine: Tom Rothamel / Renpytom

Programming and Script: Raseruuu (me)

Protagonist art: Raseruuu

Partner: Jetro Eribal

Music: Maoudamashii

Enemy Sprites: cyanyurikago

BGs: Uncle Mugenjohncel
